row.process:
:SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = STR_TRIM(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#) :SET &POS# = STR_FIND(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#, " ,") :WHILE &POS# > 0 : SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = STR_SUB(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#, " ,", ",") : SET &POS# = STR_FIND(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#, " ,") :ENDWHILE
:SET &POS# = STR_FIND(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#, ", ") :WHILE &POS# > 0 : SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = STR_SUB(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#, ", ", ",") : SET &POS# = STR_FIND(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#, ", ") :ENDWHILE
